sn1.53:1: v.87"What is the friend of one on a journey?What is the friend in one's own home?What is the friend of one in need?What is the friend in the future life?"[n.7] Reading in pāda a (in the next verse too)pavasatowith Be, Se, and Ee2, as againstpathavatoin Ee.
sn1.53:2: v.188"A caravan is the friend of one on a journey;A mother is the friend in one's own home;A comrade when the need arisesIs one's friend again and again.The deeds of merit one has done—That is the friend in the future life."
